title: THOUGHT / THE DESTROYER
description: Pain Threshold turns you into THE DESTROYER! (a thought for punching and not taking damage). Anti-Object Task Force.

dialogueTree.title: Pain Threshold: "Bent metal, broken glass... your pa..."
dialogueTree.text: Bent metal, broken glass... your path lies strewn with the broken forms of everyday objects...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You are *The Destroyer*, the bane o..."
links.text: You are *The Destroyer*, the bane of inanimate matter.

links.title: You: "Gaze upon me, stuff, and despair!"
links.text: Gaze upon me, stuff, and despair!

links.title: You: "No, I'm just a disempowered individ..."
links.text: No, I'm just a disempowered individual trying to take my disempowerment out on everyday objects.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Look! There's a discarded milk cart..."
links.text: Look! There's a discarded milk carton on the floor. Why don't you destroy that, too?

links.title: You: "Good idea. Fuck you, milk carton, t..."
links.text: Good idea. Fuck you, milk carton, this is all *your* fault!

links.title: You: "No, I actually feel sorry for the t..."
links.text: No, I actually feel sorry for the things I've destroyed. (I'm sorry, milk carton.)

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You're right, that's definitely not..."
links.text: You're right, that's definitely not the behaviour of a destroyer at all. That's just severe anger-management problems and a disregard for property rights.
